docs.snippet: John R. Morrill has been elected chairman and chief executive officer of UMC Industries, Inc., manufacturer of vending equipment, it was announced last week. He succeeds John L. Wilson, who was elected vice chairman of the board. James R. Brown Jr...
docs.lead_paragraph: John R. Morrill has been elected chairman and chief executive officer of UMC Industries, Inc., manufacturer of vending equipment, it was announced last week. He succeeds John L. Wilson, who was elected vice chairman of the board. James R. Brown Jr. continues as president and chief operating officer.

docs.snippet: Three directors of Liquidonics Industries Inc., were elected to the board of UMC Industries, Inc., it was disclosed yesterday. They are N. Norman Muller, chairman and president of Liquidonics; Roy C. Turner, and Alphonse A. Jacobellis....

docs.snippet: An executive of the General Electric Company had been tapped by UMC Industries to be its president and chief operating officer.  Edwin F. Phelps, 49, general manager of the energy applications program at G.E., succeeds H. Ridgely Bullock in the UM...
docs.lead_paragraph: An executive of the General Electric Company had been tapped by UMC Industries to be its president and chief operating officer. Edwin F. Phelps, 49, general manager of the energy applications program at G.E., succeeds H. Ridgely Bullock in the UMC position, effective July 1. Mr. Bullock, 49, continues as chairman and chief executive.
